title: You're Fired
creator_credit: John Taylor, Film Victoria and Taylormade Films
brief_description: An animated film which deals with fire prevention around the home, the need to plan escape routes and what to do if fire occurs. Using a lively quiz show format featuring devilish Hot Harry, the film teaches children about fire hazards.
creator_credit_for_label: John Taylor, Film Victoria and Taylormade Films
